title: Take a look at what caused my pvp.net kernel error
body:
Scroll and look at the bold parts of my latest patcher log

Failed to launch PMB huh? Rito please. I can't fix this by installing PMB, it and its parents are dead.

replies.body:
Hey Socio,

Could you perform the steps listed on the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for me? Try the flush DNS step first. Let me know if anything helps.

-DTN
